summary: Printable Parameters of one of my Characters.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/16043-5-1403194558.jpg[/img]

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Print out or write down the parameters.
2) Load your Save Game.
3) Press "~" to open the console (Underneat the ESC key)
4) Typ "showracemenu" without the quotes to open the character creation menu.
5) Set the sliders according to the Parameters.
6) Once done, press "R" to save your new character.

Done!

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Mods Used:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554][b]Navetsea Female Face[/b][/url] by Navetsea
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/53670][b]Navetsea Face Fixes[/b][/url] by Svarog
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49069][b]Improved Eyes Skyrim[/b][/url] by missjennabee [color=yellow](sadly enough this file is hidden)[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665][b]Better Makeup for SKSE[/b][/url] by Diethardt
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/690][b]Freckles for Females[/b][/url] by realadry
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4489][b]Weathered Warpaint and Improved Dirt[/b][/url] by Xenius
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327][b]SG Female Eyebrows[/b][/url] by Hello Santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4307][b]Superior Lore-Friendly Hair[/b][/url] by skyrimaguas
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29791][b]No More Ugly Bronze Shine[/b][/url] by COTS
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31782][b]Dry Skin[/b][/url] by Svarog

========================================================================================
